original_text: Which was the son of Enos, which was the son of Seth, which was the son of Adam, which was the son of God.
korean_text: 그 위는 에노스요 그 위는 셋이요 그 위는 아담이요 그 위는 하나님이시니라

sentences.original_text: Which was the son of Enos
which was the son of Seth
which was the son of Adam
which was the son of God
